statements: SELECT * FROM successful_authentications WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT id, username, authentication_time FROM successful_authentications ORDER BY authentication_time DESC;
SELECT username, authentication_method FROM successful_authentications WHERE authentication_method = 'password';
SELECT authentication_time, username FROM successful_authentications WHERE user_id = 200 ORDER BY authentication_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT authentication_method FROM successful_authentications;
SELECT * FROM successful_authentications WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, authentication_time FROM successful_authentications WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY authentication_time DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_authentications FROM successful_authentications WHERE authentication_method = 'password';
SELECT username, authentication_method FROM successful_authentications WHERE authentication_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_logins FROM successful_authentications GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logins > 5 ORDER BY total_logins DESC;
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT id, success FROM authentication_attempts WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE action = 'login' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM authentication_attempts GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM authentication_attempts WHERE success = true;
SELECT * FROM authentication_attempts WHERE timestamp >= '2021-01-01' AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, action FROM authentication_logs WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, action FROM authentication_logs WHERE action = 'Login' ORDER BY log_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, timestamp FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 1234 AND action IN ('Login', 'Logout') ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM authenticated_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM authenticated_users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, authentication_time FROM authenticated_users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE login_status = 'success';
SELECT user_id, failure_time, failure_reason FROM authentication_failures ORDER BY failure_time ASC;
SELECT * FROM authenticated_users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, authentication_time FROM authenticated_users WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY authentication_time DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, login_time, login_status FROM authenticated_users LEFT JOIN authentication_logs ON authenticated_users.user_id = authentication_logs.user_id;

SELECT user_id, username, failure_time, failure_reason FROM authenticated_users INNER JOIN authentication_failures ON authenticated_users.user_id = authentication_failures.user_id WHERE authentication_failures.failure_reason LIKE '%incorrect%';

SELECT user_id, COUNT(log_id) AS total_logins FROM authenticated_users LEFT JOIN authentication_logs ON authenticated_users.user_id = authentication_logs.user_id GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_logins > 5 ORDER BY total_logins DESC;
SELECT * FROM successful_auth_attempts;
SELECT username, successful_login_time FROM successful_auth_attempts ORDER BY successful_login_time DESC;
SELECT id, username FROM password_changes WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT * FROM failed_auth_attempts WHERE username = 'user1';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM account_lockouts;
SELECT * FROM successful_auth_attempts;
SELECT username, successful_login_time FROM successful_auth_attempts ORDER BY successful_login_time DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_successful_attempts FROM successful_auth_attempts GROUP BY username HAVING COUNT(*) >= 3;
SELECT username, lockout_time FROM account_lockouts WHERE lockout_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT username, MAX(password_changed_time) AS latest_password_change FROM password_changes;
SELECT user_id, username FROM successful_authentications ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM authentication_logs WHERE user_id = 1001 AND success = true
SELECT username, ip_address FROM successful_authentications WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT user_id, role_name FROM user_roles JOIN user_accounts ON user_roles.user_id = user_accounts.user_id
SELECT user_id, permission_name FROM role_permissions JOIN user_roles ON role_permissions.role_id = user_roles.role_id WHERE role_name = 'Admin'
SELECT * FROM successful_authentications WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, ip_address FROM successful_authentications WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT log_id, message FROM authentication_logs WHERE success = TRUE ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT ua.username, rp.permission_name FROM user_accounts AS ua JOIN user_roles AS ur ON ua.user_id = ur.user_id JOIN role_permissions AS rp ON ur.role_id = rp.role_id;
SELECT * FROM successful_authentications sa JOIN authentication_logs al ON sa.user_id = al.user_id WHERE sa.ip_address LIKE '192.168.%';
